name: Iates, Etherym Barrier
text:
If this card is in your hand, you can banish 2 "Etherym" monsters from your hand and/or field; Special Summon this monster. You can return 1 banished "Etherym" monster to the Deck (Quick Effect); Negate the activation of 1 Spell, Trap, or Monster effect your opponent controls. You can only activate this effect of "Iates, Etherym Barrier" once per turn. Apply the following effect(s) depending on the number of banished "Etherym" monsters with different names.
(2+): "Etherym" monsters cannot be destroyed in battle or by opponent's card effect.
(4+): "Etherym" monsters cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. 
(6+): Your opponent cannot activate effects in response to "Etherym" monster effects.
